overview: In a world of chaos, wars are not the only battle present in the chambers of reality; our minds are our greatest enemy. Is it her or someone she has kept long-hidden?  Gula, the restlessness of the soul, presents the indefinite cycle of ups and downs as we try to uncover the tiring process of finding ones' self and identity -- the discovery of the different layers of who we are in order to reach enlightenment.

production_companies.name: A Piece of My Story Production

title: Gula
